content: hello! I just recently found cranelift and it's seems to be very interesting but I don't have any compiler experiences yet :( Is it hard to contribute to some stuff?

It's ok if you don't have any experience prior! It depends mostly on what you'd like to achieve. You can find more information about contributing online but it generally boils down to "send a PR and work with the reviewer"

Alex Crichton said:

okeydokey!
